documentation.title: Array Single Line Declarations
documentation.standard: Code must start immediately after the opening parenthesis.

code.title: Valid: code starts immediately after opening parenthesis

documentation.standard: Closing parenthesis mush be immediately after last valid code.

code.title: Valid: last code was immediately followed by closing parenthesis

documentation.standard: The comma must be immediately after the array element and must have one (and only one) space after.

code.title: Valid: comma immediately after element and one space after
Invalid: space before comma and no space after comma

documentation.standard: Double arrows must have one (and only one) space before and after.

code.title: Invalid: no space around double arrow
